goal: Add a new contact named 'John Doe'
self_reflections: To add a new contact named 'John Doe', I need to click on the "Add Contact" button which will open the contact creation form where I can enter the contact's name and other details.
To add a new contact named 'John Doe', I need to first click on the Name field to enter the contact's name. This is the logical first step in the contact creation process.
